runs.comm: lively start already from Mohammad Aamer, outside off stump, zippy, Warner fences at it and misses
Warner strikes back immediately, dished up full and on leg stump and Warner flicked it past square leg for a boundary
this time it's back to an off-stump line, Warner once again flinches at it and misses
good ball this, on a length and off-stump line, Warner solidly behind it
a touch shorter this time, Warner aiming a big pull shot but probably got through it too quickly and ended up wearing it on the chest
good ball to finish up a good over, hint of movement away from Warner from outside off, leading edge flies harmlessly down to third man for a single
starts well, skidding it through and Warner gets back trying to cut but can't get it away
shoved down the ground, ugly shot, but effective and picks up a single
Watson deals with his first ball well enough, turning it from around middle to midwicket
good tight bowling this, Watson tries to bunt it down the ground but Mohammad Hafeez skips round and fields
a touch shorter this time, clipped into the midwicket region for a single
and here is the first big shot! Warner comes down the track and drives handsomely down the ground for six! All timing from Warner and ruins an excellent over
good stuff from Mohammad Aamer, full and swinging in, Watson trying to drive ends up inside-edging down to fine leg
a touch short, almost allowed Warner to unleash a massive pull shot, but it was a touch too quick for him and he couldn't get much off it, trickles away for a single
fuller to Watson, he loves the drive and throws his hands through the ball, didn't quite time it but it flew down to long off for a couple
good running here, making full use of the big outfield, Watson turned it off his legs down to midwicket and collects a couple
really good ball, deserved a dot really, full and swinging and straight, but Watson squeezed it to cover and raced through for a single
yorker to finish up, Warner lost his balance and it almost squeezed under the bat, but hit his toe and rolled away safely
Mohammad Hafeez to continue, Watson unfurls a big sweep, doesn't get much of it, but the bottom edge raced away down towards deep fine leg for a boundary
dropped very close, it was a full toss that Watson chipped to midwicket, and Misbah-ul-Haq couldn't get round quick enough, instead shoving out a hand and it goes down
full punishment here, in the slot and Watson swipes it powerfully over deep midwicket
on the sweep again, Pakistan really living dangerously here but Watson can't get hold of it, bottom edging away for one
oh dear, this is very expensive. Warner on one knee and mowing it straight past the bowler to the boundary, bullet straight
dot ball to finish a very damaging over, Warner attempting another huge heave but can't connect
full again from Aamer, Watson drives tamely towards the covers, and a moment of calm as no run is taken
close again this time, Misbah-ul-Haq almost reaching a chance as Watson gets a leading edge on an attempted leg-side hoik, good effort running back from midwicket but he just couldn't reach it
good ball again, Watson content to drive very correctly in to the off side for a single
oh dear, full toss served up and Warner obliges, banging it powerfully through midwicket for a boundary, really good stuff this from Warner
it's boundaries galore, Warner is an ugly dynamite in Twenty20 cricket, full and he gives himself some room and thumps it all along the carpet through extra cover for four
dot ball to finish, but Australia are in full command, this one is yorker length and Warner squeezes it towards midwicket
good start from Sami, on a length and line outside off, Watson stands tall and punches it into the offside for a single
touch shorter to Warner, he hops back a touch hurriedly and turns it away towards square leg for another single
Sami goes full and Watson is on the front foot lacing a drive that rockets straight to mid off for one

gone this time! Sami strikes! That is massive relief for Pakistan, things were looking out of hand, but this was dug in a touch short, Warner tried to pull but could only top-edge it down to Umar Akmal, who made no mistake on the square leg boundary
good stuff from Sami, on off stump, decent pace, Watson cuts but straight to the point fielder
poor delivery to finish up and Watson punishes him, on leg stump, a touch short and pulled away firmly for four
starts well enough, zipping it on to leg stump, Clarke turns it away wristily for a single down to fine leg
good ball again, Watson back and trying to force it through the off side, can't get it away
lovely ball this, slower, loopy, inviting a drive the Watson misses
good tight stuff again, on and around off stump, Watson tries to back-cut but can only find short third man
it's like a Test match, good line, good length, Watson stretches forward and defends
Watson edging down the pitch, fired in quicker and almost yorks him, good over
tidy start, full and Clarke works it away into the leg side for a single
well, this is an excellent shot, full and Watson smashes it down the ground firmly for a boundary, just simple cricket well executed
too short this, not good bowing, Watson waits on it and crashes a pull shot away though midwicket, almost collects four but some sharp fielding on the boundary saves one
nicely bowled, Watson can't get much of it and it runs away for a single
gone! Real bonus for Hafeez  and Pakistan! Quicker ball, Clarke gave himself room to try and cut it away, but it zipped through and castled middle stump
good first ball to David Hussey, the new man, full and straight and driven calmly back to the bowler
Afridi continues to cause trouble, this is fuller and a touch slower outside off stump, Watson edges his drive though to point and some sharp running allows a single
zippy delivery, Hussey trying to cut it away but has neither the time nor space for the shot
good ball again, full and Hussey drives carefully into the off side without any power
gets a run this time, threading it through the off side for a single
oh top shot! Just a touch too much width and a bit short, and Watson cashes in, cutting through point for a boundary
two more, ruins what would have been a tight over, shoving through the cover for a couple
Hussey hanging back on his crease, throws his arms through this and it goes down to long off
Watson just does not let up, big stride down on one knee and slogs it flat and powerfully for six over long on
brings up a half century in style! Down on one knee again, and smashing it through midwicket this time for another big six
thrown well outside off stump, Watson was aiming another sweep so can't time it well from there
better ball this time, fullish and straight and driven calmly away to long off for a single
quiet finish to another brutal over for Pakistan, Hussey trying to work it down the ground can't beat the bowler
Afridi trying to cut off Watson's big sweep by shoving this well outside off stump again, Watson sweeps nevertheless, but without timing down to deep midwicket
driven away calmly through the covers to give Watson back the strike
Watson bunts this again down towards midwicket and easily collects two
oh dear, full toss from Afridi and punished, easily, sweeping in front of square on the leg side for four
a touch shorter this but it's on to Watson too quickly to time his leg-side shove, it trickles away
keeps the strike by working this away down to deep midwicket for a single
slightly desperate appeal from Kamran behind the stumps as this full ball raps Watson on the stumps
doosra beats Watson! Outside off stump, touch of air, Watson aims a sweep but finds only fresh air
gets all of this though! Low full-toss and banged through the covers for four, not easy to time those but he did it well
back on the leg side this time, doesn't quite time it but collects one
Hussey looks surprised as this doosra turns away from him, ends up guiding it tamely along the ground to point
gets another single here, working it into the leg side
Hussey opens his shoulders this time. Clean strike 92 meters down the ground for six, so simple
just a single this time, which well feel like mercy, as Hussey pushes it away for one
stand and deliver from Watson, touch of air and Watson throws his hands through the line. and the ball rockets down for six over midwicket
follows it up with a single, trying to fetch it from outside off and can't quite time it
another single for Hussey, worked away calmly into the leg side
well outside off stump, spinning away further, Watson swishes at thin air
Sami is back and it's a tidy return, outside off, Hussey guides it to point
good ball again, some respite here for Pakistan, forced into the off side for a couple
well, how did this happen? Just swiped from a decent length on off stump through straight midwicket for four
another leg side heave attempted, this time Hussey can't connect and it hits him on the body
oh dear, dropped, it's Pakistan at their most hazardous, swiped down to long off and put down, plenty of time but dropped
Sami finishes a good over, Watson, for once, can't inflict any pain
lucky to get away with this, shortish on leg stump, but pulled straight to the short fine leg fielder
gets all of this one, flighted on to around leg stump, Hussey down on one knee and crashing it in front of square for four
chipped over the covers for a couple, Hussey in total control
good ball this, quicker and Hussey can't get hold it his leg-side swipe and it trickles away
almost another chance goes begging here, swished down towards deep midwicket, the fielder can't decide whether to stick or twist, in the end can't reach it
swept away, beats the short fine leg and the diving man on the boundary, more pain for Pakistan
goodness me, this is a monster. Hussey clears his front leg, and mows this down the ground for a big six
he is relentless, driven from a full length, somehow finding the power to get it away firmly down towards the mid off boundary
slower ball and wide outside off stump, too wide for the batsman or umpire
another crunching blow, really unforgiving, just back of a length, asking to be pulled away and Hussey nailed it over mid wicket
another one! Full this time, into Hussey's hitting arc and he just threw his hands though it, clean strike, another six
we need bigger boundaries, Hussey gives himself a bit of room, Sami dropped it short and Hussey murdered it over long on for another one to bring up a thunderous fifty
finally finds a yorker length, far far too late, Hussey can only squeeze it away for a single
finally, some peace for Pakistan. Hussey departs, he tried to mow this away into the leg side again, but finally finds a fielder who can catch, Fawad Alam makes no mistake on the boundary
shortish again, Watson goes back and shovels it away down to the fine leg boundary for a single
Mike Hussey replaces his brother and guides his first ball through the covers for an easy single

good ball from  Saeed Ajmal sees the end of Watson! Quicker ball and flat and full, Watson looking to unleash another huge leg-side swipe, misses and is struck bang in front. Brings the end to a brilliant knock
but is a picture of delicacy here, working it round the corner for a single
Hussey doesn't time this at all, just working it into the leg side, but the lack of timing allows him to pick a couple down to deep midwicket
Sami continues, and starts well after his horror-show last over, full and straight and White punches it down the ground for a single
lucky to get away with this, full and well outside off stump, Hussey can't get much of it and ends up guiding it down to short third man
oops, high full toss, White swiped it away, without much timing it trickles through to midwicket and they collect a couple
good yorker here, where was this last over? White still squeezes it away and some swift running allows him to collect two
another excellent yorker, not even White can get any elevation on this, as he drives down to long on for one
right in the blockhole, nothing Hussey can do about this apart from jab a bat down in time
too full this time, Hussey down on one knee but Sami is doing the begging, it's guided away neatly through to the fine leg boundary, top shot
excellent bowling let down but sloppy fielding from Salman Butt, White got well across to the off side, tried to sweep it away, couldn't time it but Butt lets it through him a short fine leg
nicely done from  Saeed Ajmal, holding it back, White tried to get it away but could only heave it to the square leg boundary where Fawad Alam takes the catch
fired in at Hussey, not giving him any room, Hussey tries to sweep it away but can't quite get the vicious power needed so it goes for a single down to square leg
another single, good bowling this, he really should have opened the bowling, Haddin whipping a fullish ball into the midwicket region
another fielding lapse allows runs, it was a touch short, Hussey cut firmly to point, where the fielder spills it and allows a couple
really good shot this, floated up outside off and Hussey punched it firmly, timing it really well and it sails over the long off fielder

gone! No mistake from Sami at short third man, it was full and outside off, Haddin throws his hands at it, gets an edge and neatly taken. Dot ball is what matters at this stage, but the total is already imposing
Aamer strikes! Lovely yorker and Johnson can't get his bat down in time, it crashes into middle stump, lovely bowling

well it's three wickets in three balls, but not a hat-trick! Another good yorker, Smith swished and misses, they attempt to run a bye to get Hussey on strike, Kamran is quick with the throw and Hussey is run out

well, what have we here!? Is it four in four!? Another yorker, another swish, another attempted bye, and yes, another run out. Good stuff from Pakistan in this final over, a touch farcical out there, it must be said.
ooh, this time they reject the bye, Tait plays and misses haplessly at a good ball outside off, but stands his ground imperiously

gone this time! Bowled him! How utterly extraordinary and bizarre. Decent length and line, Tait gives himself room and it cannons off his pads on to off stump. So we have a five-wicket maiden, yet Australia are completely on top.
